common.diagnosticDescription: Discover your strengths and areas for growth with our comprehensive diagnostic tests. Each assessment provides personalized insights and recommendations for your learning journey.

jvdt2.title: JVDT-2 Kids Learning Style Assessment
jvdt2.description: Discover how you like to learn best! Choose the option that sounds most like you.
jvdt2.instructions: Read each statement and pick the one that sounds most like you. There are no right or wrong answers - we just want to know how you like to learn!

Story-Why-Dream-Kind.title: The Imaginative Helper
Story-Why-Dream-Kind.tagline: Learns through stories, dreams big, and cares deeply.
Story-Why-Dream-Kind.kidDescription: Wow! You love stories (ğŸ–¼ï¸), asking 'Why?' (â“), dreaming up big ideas (ğŸ’­), and being super kind (ğŸ’–). Telling stories to help people is your superpower!
Story-Why-Dream-Kind.teacher: Natural empath and storyteller; connects ideas emotionally and wants to help others.

Story-Why-Dream-Fair.title: The Wise Dreamer
Story-Why-Dream-Fair.tagline: Dreams up fair ideas that make the world better.
Story-Why-Dream-Fair.kidDescription: Stories (ğŸ–¼ï¸) and asking 'Why?' (â“) are your jam! You have big dreams (ğŸ’­) and always want things to be fair (âš–ï¸). You're great at imagining fair ways to play!
Story-Why-Dream-Fair.teacher: Balances imagination with justice; loves stories with morals and lessons.

Story-Why-Plan-Kind.title: The Gentle Organizer
Story-Why-Plan-Kind.tagline: Plans kind ways to make good ideas real.
Story-Why-Plan-Kind.kidDescription: You learn well with stories (ğŸ–¼ï¸) and like knowing 'Why?' (â“). You also enjoy having a plan (ğŸ—ºï¸) and being really kind (ğŸ’–). Making kind plans is one of your talents!
Story-Why-Plan-Kind.teacher: Likes stories but also structure; leads softly and kindly.

1.text: How do you remember things best?
1.optionA: I remember pictures and stories best.
1.optionB: I remember facts and numbers best.

2.text: When watching a movie, what do you notice?
2.optionA: I notice people's feelings in a movie.
2.optionB: I notice small details in the background.
